SEASON ONE

THE
DRIVE

Lisa’s maddening struggle to get Aldo and Ella into the car for the 5-hour drive to Marco’s home in L.A. evokes decades-old memories of a fraught family car trip. Back then it was her dad who kept all the secrets. These days? It’s the whole Giordano clan.

PILOT

1

THE
CONFESSION

Trapped in the back of her parents’ car, Lisa’s mind replays the moments that shattered her marriage, while in the present her massive texting #FAIL seems to seal its fate. Tano’s encounter at the airport has him wondering if he could be a father. Marco bonds with one of his employees.

EPISODE

2

THE
SUITCASE

Lisa makes a friend during a roadside coffee stop. Aldo’s bigotry rears its racist head, while his memory visits a time when he was the hated “other”. Tano and Nisha arrive at Marco’s. With a surprise guest in tow.

EPISODE

3

THE
FUGUE

When Ella enters a German-speaking fugue state and thinks Lisa is her Grandma, Lisa panics and calls Bill. Meanwhile, Ella’s “fugue” has her in mid-1940’s Germany, amidst a family dynamic even more tense than that of the Giordanos. Aldo is pulled over on the 210 freeway and comes dangerously close to being arrested.

EPISODE

4

THE
DATE

When Christmas Eve Dinner comes to a screeching halt (thanks to her annual screaming argument with her father), Lisa ditches the family for a date with a guy she met at the airport. But she can’t stop thinking about the first time she met Bill. It’s almost as if he were there. Which, by the way, he IS when she comes home. The next morning.

EPISODE

5

THE
SURPRISE

Christmas morning at the Giordano house is rife with memories of… Christmas morning at the Giordano house. The other one. When they were kids. Marco can’t get his brother Dino out of his head. Lisa is determined to keep Bill at her side. And Tano is about to reveal a big surprise… when Ella collapses and has to be rushed to the hospital.

EPISODE

6

THE
SECRET

Lisa waits for Ella’s release from the hospital. Tano flashes back to his breakup from Sarah and wonders if his life could have been different had he not had such a toxically masculine father. Christmas dinner blows up when Tano learns that Lisa’s been keeping a secret – one he’s sure belongs to him.

EPISODE

7

THE
DECISION

When Ella enters a German-speaking fugue state and thinks Lisa is her Grandma, Lisa panics and calls Bill. Meanwhile, Ella’s “fugue” has her in mid-1940’s Germany, amidst a family dynamic even more tense than that of the Giordanos. Aldo is pulled over on the 210 freeway and comes dangerously close to being arrested.

EPISODE

8
